name: Galio
title: the Colossus
lore: Outside the gleaming city of Demacia, the stone colossus Galio keeps vigilant watch. Built as a bulwark against enemy mages, he often stands motionless for decades until the presence of powerful magic stirs him to life. Once activated, Galio makes the most of his time, savoring the thrill of a fight and the rare honor of defending his countrymen. But his triumphs are always bittersweet, for the magic he destroys is also his source of reanimation, and each victory leaves him dormant once again.
blurb: Outside the gleaming city of Demacia, the stone colossus Galio keeps vigilant watch. Built as a bulwark against enemy mages, he often stands motionless for decades until the presence of powerful magic stirs him to life. Once activated, Galio makes the...
allytips: You can release Shield of Durand even while crowd controlled.
You can use the minimap ally icons to cast Hero's Entrance.
You can use the step back from Justice Punch to dodge enemy spells.
enemytips: Galio moves slower when he is charging Shield of Durand.
Hero's Entrance can be interrupted before Galio jumps into the air.
Galio cannot traverse walls with Justice Punch.

riot_spells.name: Winds of War
riot_spells.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado that deals damage over time.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Galio fires two windblasts that deal {{ qmissiledamage }} magic damage.

When the windblasts meet, they combine into a giant tornado that deals {{ percentsuperqdamagett }}% of enemies' maximum Health (max {{ superqmonstermaxdamage*3 }} vs. monsters) as magic damage over {{ superqduration }} seconds.

riot_spells.name: Shield of Durand
riot_spells.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Passive: After not taking damage for {{ e6 }} seconds Galio gains a shield that absorbs {{ f3 }} magic damage.

First Cast: Galio starts to charge, gaining {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f4 }})% Damage Reduction from Magic Damage and {{ f5 }}% of that amount as Damage Reduction from Physical Damage. While charging, Galio slows himself by {{ e3 }}%.

Second Cast: Galio taunts nearby enemy champions for {{ e4 }} to {{ e7 }} seconds, deals {{ f8 }} (+{{ f9 }}) to {{ f10 }} (+{{ f11 }}) damage, and refreshes the Damage Reduction for {{ e8 }} seconds. Taunt duration, damage, and radius increase with charge time.

riot_spells.name: Justice Punch
riot_spells.description: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Galio lunges forward with a mighty blow, dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to the first champion and knocking him into the air for {{ knockupduration }} seconds. Enemies in the way take {{ pvedamage }} magic damage.

Galio will stop upon hitting terrain with Justice Punch.

riot_spells.name: Hero's Entrance
riot_spells.description: Galio designates an ally's position as his landing spot. After a delay Galio smashes down location, knocking up nearby enemies.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Galio designates an allied champion's current position as his landing spot.

When Galio lands, enemies in the area take {{ totaldamage }} magic damage and are knocked into the air for {{ stundurationouter }} seconds.

riot_passive.name: Colossal Smash
riot_passive.description: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area.

i1.name: Colossal Smash
i1.blurb: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area. Colossal Smash's cooldown is reduced when Galio hits champions with his spells.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Galio's''' next [[basic attack]] deals {{pp|15 to 200|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' magic resistance)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''total''' magic damage}}}} to its target and all enemies around it.
i1.description2: ''Colossal Smash'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}, dealing {{as|{{critical damage|100|melee}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to all targets hit.
i1.notes: * {{ii|Sheen|Spellblade}} will also get converted to magic damage but will deal its damage only to the primary target.

q1.name: Winds of War
q1.blurb: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' fires two windblasts that arc to either side before converging to the target area, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies they pass through.
q1.description2: When the blasts meet, the gusts form a tornado that advances for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds to every enemy within, with the target's health ratio capped at 150 damage against {{tip|monsters}}.
q1.leveling2: {{st|Tornado Magic Damage Per Tick|{{as|2% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.6{{recurring|6}}%}} per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Total Tornado Magic Damage|{{as|6%  {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
q1.notes:
* ''Spell shields'' will block the gusts damage but not the tornado's.
* {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{cai|Unbreakable|Braum}} can block each windblast individually.
** The tornado will not form if only one windblast reaches the target location.

w1.name: Shield of Durand
w1.blurb: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt nearby enemies.
w1.description: {{sbc|Passive - Anti-Magic Bulwark:}} '''Galio''' gains a shield that absorbs {{as|magic damage}} that lasts until broken, refreshing after not taking damage for 12 seconds.
w1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Shield|{{as|{{ap|8 to 20}}% of his '''maximum''' health}}}}
w1.description2: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Galio''' {{ct|windup|charges|items=true,true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,melee|consume=true|spells=true,false,false,false,false}} for up to 3 seconds, {{tip|ground|grounding}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} himself by 15%, and gaining {{as|magic damage}} reduction and half of that amount as {{as|physical damage}} reduction. Charging increases ''Shield of Durand's'' radius, damage and {{tip|taunt}} duration.
w1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage Reduction|{{ap|20 to 40}}% {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}} {{as|(+ 8% per 100 '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}{{st|Physical Damage Reduction|{{ap|10 to 20}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} {{as|(+ 4% per 100 '''bonus''' magic resistance)}}}}
w1.description3: {{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Galio''' refreshes the damage reduction for 2 seconds, {{tip|taunt|taunts}} nearby enemies and sets their {{sti|ms|{{as|movement speed}}}} to a {{as|static 60|ms}} for {{pp|type=charge time|9|0.5 to 1.5|0 to 2|displayformula=0.5+(0.125 per 0.25 seconds charged).}} seconds.
w1.description4: Affected enemies take {{as|magic damage}}, increased by {{pp|type=charge time|9|key=%|0 to 200|0 to 2|displayformula=100%+(25% per 0.25 seconds charged).}}.
w1.leveling4: {{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 80}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|20*3 to 80*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
w1.effect_radius: {{pp|type=charge time|9|175 to 350|0 to 2|displayformula=175+(21.875 per 0.25 seconds charged).}}
w1.notes:
* ''Static movement speed'' means that the target is unable to modify it anymore (ex: with [[slow resist]] / {{ai|On the Hunt|Sivir}}).
** This effect is negated only if the target is slow immune (ex: {{ai|Highlander|Master Yi}}).
* After the second cast, there is a brief period where other spells can only be buffered.
* '''{{Sbc|Possible Bug}}''': The ability key does not need to be held down when buffered in other abilities except from {{ai|Winds of War|Galio}}.

e1.name: Justice Punch
e1.blurb: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' steps backwards, and after {{fd|0.4}} seconds he {{tip|dash|dashes}} forward, though not through terrain.
e1.description2: He stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing them and all enemies along the way {{as|magic damage}}, while also {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds. Non-champions receive 50% reduced damage.
e1.leveling2: {{st|Champion Magic Damage|{{ap|90 to 250}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Reduced Magic Damage|{{ap|90/2 to 250/2}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}
e1.notes: * '''Galio''' can cast movement effects during the ability, and buffers all other active effects.

r1.name: Hero's Entrance
r1.blurb: Galio grants damage reduction to an ally. After a delay Galio smashes down on the ally's original location, knocking up nearby enemies.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Galio''' designates the target allied champion's location at the time of cast as his landing spot, {{tip|channels}} for {{fd|1.25}} seconds, and then {{tip|dashes}} to them, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies on impact and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
r1.notes: * Galio cannot cast Hero's Entrance on allies while {{tip|Nearsight|nearsighted}}.
